content:
That's great to hear! Organizing your kitchen utensils can make a huge difference in the efficiency and enjoyment of cooking and baking. It's amazing how something as simple as categorizing your utensils can make a big impact.

I'm a big fan of kitchen organization, and dividers are a great way to keep similar items together and easy to find. It's also a great way to declutter your countertops and reduce visual clutter. Plus, it's always satisfying to see your utensils neatly organized and easy to access.

When it comes to kitchen organization, every little bit counts, and it's great that you're thinking about how to optimize your space. Have you considered organizing your ingredients or spices as well? That can be a game-changer for bakers!

Now, back to the biga: I'm excited to hear how it turns out and how it affects the flavor and texture of your sourdough bread. Remember to be patient and don't overmix the dough. With a little practice and patience, you'll be creating beautiful, delicious sourdough bread in no time!

Keep me posted on your baking adventures, and feel free to ask if you have any more questions or need any more tips!
